mappings.name: Get a revision for a custom action

schema.description: A revision of this custom action.

createdAt.description: The date the revision was created.

revisionId.description: The version number of the custom action.

mappings.name: Get all revisions for a custom action
Create or replace a custom action function

schema.description: A serverless function associated with this custom workflow action.

functionType.description: The type of function. This determines when the function will be called.

id.description: The ID qualifier for the function. This is used to specify which input field a function is associated with for `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS` and `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS` function types.

schema.description: A serverless function associated with this custom workflow action.

functionType.description: The type of function. This determines when the function will be called.

id.description: The ID qualifier for the function. This is used to specify which input field a function is associated with for `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS` and `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS` function types.

mappings.name: Create or replace a custom action function

schema.description: A serverless function associated with this custom workflow action.

functionType.description: The type of function. This determines when the function will be called.

id.description: The ID qualifier for the function. This is used to specify which input field a function is associated with for `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS` and `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS` function types.

schema.description: A serverless function associated with this custom workflow action.

functionType.description: The type of function. This determines when the function will be called.

id.description: The ID qualifier for the function. This is used to specify which input field a function is associated with for `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS` and `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS` function types.

actionUrl.description: The URL that will accept an HTTPS request each time workflows executes the custom action.

archivedAt.description: The date that this custom action was archived, if the custom action is archived.

functions.description: A list of functions associated with the custom workflow action.

id.description: The ID of the custom action.

inputFieldDependencies.description: A list of dependencies between the input fields. These configure when the input fields should be visible.

inputFields.description: The list of input fields to display in this custom action.

labels.description: The user-facing labels for the custom action.

objectTypes.description: The object types that this custom action supports.

published.description: Whether this custom action is published to customers.
